text: The Substitute is a 1996 action and crime-thriller movie. The movie is about high school gangs in an inner-city area. Ernie Hudson plays Principal Claude. Glenn Plummer plays Darrell Sherman. The movie got mixed to negative review from critics. ==Other websites== * Category:1996 crime drama movies Category:1996 thriller movies Category:American crime drama movies Category:American crime thriller movies
title: The Substitute (1996)
